description:
Welcome to this Three Sixty Academy course exclusive to Udemy.

Here with Three Sixty Academy you can study online towards making your Twitter profile create a larger impact.

Our course is comprised of 6 sections all focused on helping you create a stronger Twitter presence.

  • Introduction
  • Increase Your Followers
  • Posting On Your Timeline
  • Twitter Marketing Ideas
  • Conclusion
  • Bonus Lectures

    • More than enough to turn that Twitter profile of yours from zero to hero, using our proactive and practical approach backed up with real life examples.

    Good luck and we hope you enjoy our course!

    Please note: This is an introductory course.
title: Marketing on Twitter
